artist: Italy (Bologna); or Italy (Rome); Formerly circle of Andrea Sacchi; Formerly circle of Pietro da Cortona (Pietro Berrettini)
dimension:
15 3/8 x 12 3/4 in. (39.05 x 32.39 cm) (sheet, irregular)
23 3/4 x 19 3/4 in. (60.33 x 50.17 cm) (outer frame)
provenance: Richard Cosway, Lugt 628 (?1742-1821), London. Sale, Sotheby's, London, October 21, 1976, no. 168, as Circle of Sacchi, for £132, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1976-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Seated Male Nude
